price: 103. Ma uusan amrin Alle (yeelashada) Baxiirah (xoolo caanahooda sanamyada loo bixiyo) ama Saa’ ibah (xoolo sanamyada dartood loo sii daayo) ama Wasiilah (xoolo sanamyada lagu sadaqeysto) ama Xaam (riti sanamyada loo daayo) gaaladuse waxay ka been sheegaan Alle, badankooduna ma laha garasho.
arabic: مَا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَحِيرَةٖ وَلَا سَآئِبَةٖ وَلَا وَصِيلَةٖ وَلَا حَامٖ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā jaʿala al-lahu min baḥīratin walā sāibatin walā waṣīlatin walā ḥāmin walākinna alladhīna kafarū yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wa-aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
